name: AVK Group
description: AVK Group is a leading manufacturer and supplier of valves, fittings, and accessories for the water, gas, and wastewater industries. Founded in 1941, the company has established a strong reputation for quality, reliability, and innovative solutions in fluid control. With headquarters in Skive, Denmark, AVK operates globally with production facilities and subsidiaries spread across Europe, Asia, and North America. The company is committed to sustainability, focusing on reducing environmental impact through efficient production processes and sustainable materials. AVK's product portfolio includes a wide range of valves for various applications, including gate valves, butterfly valves, check valves, and pressure-reducing valves, all designed to meet stringent international standards. AVK is also dedicated to customer service and support, providing clients with expert advice and tailored solutions to meet their specific needs. The company actively invests in research and development to enhance its product offerings and maintain a competitive edge in the market. AVK's mission is to provide high-quality products that ensure safe and efficient water supply and management, contributing to a sustainable future for communities worldwide.
